template: SELECT MIN(company_type.kind) AS company_type_kind, MIN(company_name.name) AS company_name_name, MIN(title.id) AS title_id FROM company_name, cast_info, title, movie_companies, company_type, kind_type WHERE cast_info.movie_id = title.id AND kind_type.id = title.kind_id AND movie_companies.movie_id = title.id AND company_name.id = movie_companies.company_id AND company_type.id = movie_companies.company_type_id AND company_name.name NOT LIKE %s AND movie_companies.note NOT LIKE %s AND title.episode_nr > %s AND company_name.country_code != %s AND title.production_year BETWEEN 1955 AND 2000 AND company_type.kind = %s;
